title: Believe In Me
description: A short story: Lily’s world has been turned upside down with her decision to follow her dream of writing a novel. Her boyfriend of two years is less than supportive. All Lily wants is for Joel to see how much she loves it and how good she is at it. He won’t give her the time of day where her “wasteful career” is concerned. Lily seeks comfort in her best friend, Vaughn, who secretly hopes that the couple won’t make it through this rocky time.
author: Christine  Barber
